tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE templates (
  template_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  template_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  template_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  template_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE layouts (
    layout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    layout_name TEXT,
    layout_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    template_id INT REFERENCES templates(template_id)
);

CREATE TABLE layouts (
    layout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    layout_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    template_id INT REFERENCES templates(template_id),
    created_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    last_modified TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE whiteboards (
    whiteboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    whiteboard_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    layout_id INT REFERENCES layouts(layout_id),
    owner_id INT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE templates (
    template_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    template_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE layouts (
    layout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    layout_title VARCHAR(255),
    template_id INT,
    layout_content JSON,
    created_by VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    password VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
    user_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    permission_level INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE template_layouts (
    template_id INT,
    layout_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (template_id, layout_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES templates(template_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (layout_id) REFERENCES layouts(layout_id)
);
